Default.description_hotdesking: Reserva de escritorios de forma intuitiva a través de un mapa interactivo de tu oficina.
Default.more_about_hotdesking: Quiero saber más sobre el hot desking
Default.title_neighbourhoods: Organiza la oficina y las personas
Default.description_neighbourhoods: Crea vecindarios asignando grupos de escritorios a equipos o personas. Activa y desactiva escritorios según necesidad.
Default.more_about_neighbourhoods: Cuéntame más sobre vecindarios y equipos
Default.title_manage: Gestiona el teletrabajo de forma eficiente
Default.description_manage: Establece límites de ocuación y teletrabajo. Gestiona el aforo y la presencialidad con un calendario dinámico de espacios.
Default.more_about_manage: Quiero saber más sobre la gestión del teletrabajo
Default.title_reports: La información es poder... Y dinero
Default.description_reports: Analiza la ocupación, el uso del espacio y los costes asociados. Obtén detalles a nivel de plantilla e individuo para asegurar el cumplimiento de la ley del teletrabajo.
Default.more_about_reports: Más detalles sobre analíticas y reportes

Default.Save thousands of euros: Save thousands of euros optimizing your real estate footprint by switching to a hybrid strategy of in-office and remote work.

With DeWocracy you could save up to...
Default.We help you transition to a more flexibl: We help you transition to a more flexible workplace strategy that is less dependant on physical space. From idea to execution, we support you throughout all the stages of the process.
Default.We give you the tools to measure office: We give you the tools to measure office occupancy, understand employees' preferences, and analize costs derived from your current workplace strategy.
Default.We use the data gathered to make an offi: We use the data gathered to make an office space optimization proposal and find out your ideal workplace strategy (traditional office, flexible office, hybrid work or remote work).
Default.Implement your strategy using our bookin: Implement your strategy using our booking, monitoring and cost analysis system. Manage the admin side of remote work efficiently and assess your results to fine-tune your strategy.
Default.Real-time monitoring of your company's r: Real-time monitoring of your company's remote/in-office work breakdown.
Default.Digital clock-in, absence and holidays m: Digital clock-in, absence and holidays management.
Default.Digital clock-in, absences and holidays: Digital clock-in, absences and holidays request.

Default.CONTACT_FORM_TEXT_2: at your convenience, contact us at info@dewocracy.com or send us a message via the contact form below.
Default.Thanks for containing us! We will get in: Thanks for containing us! We will get in touch with you shortly.
Default.DeWocracy - Remote Work | Work from anyw: DeWocracy - Remote Work | Work from anywhere
Default.DeWocracy offers remote work solutions f: DeWocracy offers remote work solutions for a hybrid office strategy. Manage your company's human capital, control the office occupancy rate, lower costs and increase flexibility without compromising productivity.
